definition: to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
the key trick/the secret of success
to bid farewell/to part (usually with little hope of meeting again)
mnemonic chant/rhyme for remembering (arithmetic tables, character stroke order etc)

16-character formula, esp. Mao Zedong's mantra on guerrilla warfare: 敵進我退，敵駐我擾，敵疲我打，敵退我追|敌进我退，敌驻我扰，敌疲我打，敌退我追[di2 jin4 wo3 tui4 , di2 zhu4 wo3 rao3 , di2 pi2 wo3 da3 , di2 tui4 wo3 zhui1] when the enemy advances we retreat; when the enemy makes camp we harass; when the enemy is exhausted we fight; and when the enemy retreats we pursue

sentences.english: The tea book "Jian Cha Jue" was written by Ye Jun in Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《煎茶訣》是我國清代葉雋撰寫的一本茶書。

sentences.english: The first one is “don’t be greedy for win”.
sentences.chinese: 十訣的首要第一訣是“不得貪勝”。

definition: variant of 御[yu4]/to drive/to manage/to control
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
mystery known only to heaven (archaic)/inscrutable twist of fate/fig. top secret
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
mnemonic chant/rhyme for remembering (arithmetic tables, character stroke order etc)
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
hole/opening/orifice (of the human body)/(fig.) key (to the solution of a problem)
Lingbao county level city in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan
